page.shortlink: api objects table object handle function
page.description: Get the tables an old style 'handle'.
page.discussion: The <TBL>.HANDLE() method returns the ancient style (Version 1) handle when using a post-version 3 style Xbasic object. This allows the Xbasic programmer to reuse Version 1 code on tables that they opened using the newer object methods.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim tbl as P dim shared db_handle as N tbl = table.open("Invoice_header") ' Call a version one script that reads a shared db_handle db_handle = tbl.handle()
